content: the table runner measurments 29cm x 68cm 11 4in x 26 8in you can adjust the length of the table runner by adding or subtracting pattern repeats materials used sport weight yarn i used nako fiore 25% linen 35% cotton 40% bamboo viscose yarn 90 grams 270 meters approx of yarn needed for this pattern 3 5mm crochet hook skill level easy
